channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Finality of Dusk
channel.desc: In the year 2045, amidst environmental devastation, Ishkode and her unlikely companion Niife join forces on what is left of the land to prove that the ultimate survivors have always had to fight.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Slash/Back
channel.desc: Maika and her ragtag group of friends discover an alien invasion in their tiny arctic hamlet, and it's up to them to fight back using makeshift weapons and horror movie knowledge.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Level 16
channel.desc: Girls in a prison-like boarding school embark on a desperate search to uncover the awful truth behind their captivity.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: In 2018, Oxford got famous for a 40-metre-wide sinkhole that shut down much of the town; but they have a sense of humor about it and have made shirts, cakes, even Twitter accounts for the sinkhole.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Remy & Boo
channel.desc: Boo discovers how bandages are used and begins stamping them on everyone and everything.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Gary's Magic Fort
channel.desc: With everyone busy, Gary gets bored and ends up causing trouble in the fort; Gary learns to make his own fun.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Kiri and Lou
channel.desc: While babysitting some little birds, Lou is driven crazy by their squawking.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Lu & the Bally Bunch
channel.desc: Gus demands Lu play by the rules.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Daisy & the Gumboot Kids
channel.desc: Daisy visits a farm and meets some cows; together with the Gumboot Kids, she makes some cow cup crafts.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Jessie & the Gumboot Kids
channel.desc: Jessie Farrell sings about whales; Scout, Daisy and the Gumboot Kids join in the fun.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Scout & the Gumboot Kids
channel.desc: The Gumboot Kids learn how nature paints.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom
channel.desc: True spends a wonderful day playing with her jolly friends Zee and Bartleby in this sweet version of "See See My Playmate".

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mini-Jon and Mini-Maple
channel.desc: The mini-clones help Q with their eyes closed.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Unicorn Academy
channel.desc: Val, Cinder, Rory and Storm have a dance-off; despite her hubris, it is discovered that Val isn't exactly the best dancer.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Unicorn Academy
channel.desc: Jacinta asks Ava and Sophia to watch her unicorn, but they soon discover he has shrinking magic and a mischievous streak; the tiny unicorn takes off, giving Sophia, Ava, Wildstar and Leaf a handful of tiny sized trouble.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Unicorn Academy
channel.desc: Sophia learns more about the Unicorn Constellation; Ava throws a baby shower for a unicorn foal while trying to keep it hidden from the teachers.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Gangnam Project
channel.desc: After a shocking Showcase performance, Hannah proposes a new plan and enlists some extra help to pull it off.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Dev aims to make amends to Lauren by getting to know her better.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Kevin and Carl uncover each other's dark secrets, and Lily refuses to apologise to Sam.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Tim arranges some shifts at the garage for a grateful Brody.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Abi's discovery of Kevin's despicable lie propels her into Carl's arms.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Sam has some explaining to do, and Todd and Theo wait for Tyrone to come to their aid.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Theo's anger erupts in front of his family, and a job offer spurs James to pack his bags.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: The Nature of Things
channel.desc: Canadians push the limits of cold endurance; baby harp seals brave icy waters; flying squirrels.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Marketplace
channel.desc: "Marketplace" reveals the growing number of vet clinics being bought up by corporations across the country and reveals how those takeovers are driving up cost of care across Canada.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: Oneida Nation of the Thames is hard at work reclaiming the economic, cultural and spiritual practices that were banned by government policies over the past 100 years.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Land and Sea
channel.desc: For the first time since 1999, Canada's largest stamp collection exhibition makes a return to the Maritimes; meeting the people who passionately collect stamps, and the stories they hold.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: CBC Arts: Exhibitionists
channel.desc: Artists from across the country present their holiday-themed work.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: The Adventure Club
channel.desc: Three kids discover an ancient artifact capable of granting wishes. They decide to use it to save their local science center, but there are some who'd stop at nothing to have the artifact for themselves.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Grand Designs Australia
channel.desc: Constructing an underground acropolis in the South Australian Desert town of Coober Pedy is an ambitious undertaking, but when Paul's parents retire, he wants to build them the ultimate underground Greek mansion.
